perturbation.original_text: 3.3 The Maintenance Charges shall be invoiced by SEV calendar monthly in advance and shall be payable by DCL within fourteen days  of the invoice date.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.3 The Maintenance Charges shall be invoiced by SEV calendar monthly in advance and shall be payable by DCL within thirty days of the invoice date.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by extending the payment deadline to thirty days, conflicting with the fourteen-day deadline originally stated. This creates uncertainty about the correct payment term.

perturbation.original_text: 7.2 Additional Charges shall be levied by SEV on completion of Excepted Services within fifteen working days otherwise DCL shall have  no obligation to pay the Additional Charges. The Additional Charges shall be payable by DCL within fifteen working days of  receipt of the invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.2 Additional Charges shall be levied by SEV on completion of Excepted Services within fifteen working days otherwise DCL shall have  no obligation to pay the Additional Charges. The Additional Charges shall be payable by DCL within thirty working days of  receipt of the invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation creates a contradiction within the clause by stating additional charges should be payable within 'thirty' days of invoice receipt, while the original clause states it should be within 'fifteen' days. This inconsistency introduces ambiguity regarding the correct payment timeline and creates in-text contradictions.

perturbation.original_text: 16.1 Following expiry of the initial period described in Clause 15 above, DCL or SEV giving not less than six months notice in  writing may terminate this Agreement. In addition, DCL may terminate this Agreement with effect from the 3rd, 4th or 5th  anniversary of the Commencement Date by giving not less than six months notice in writing to SEV. During the notice  period, all Clauses and provisions of this Agreement shall remain in effect. Any defects in Vehicles notified to SEV by DCL  during the notice period shall be remedied prior to the end of this Agreement. If Schedule One has expired during the  notice period then all Maintenance Charges and Additional Charges shall be charged at the rates shown in the last  effective Schedule One increased in line with the last published Retail Price Index.
perturbation.changed_text: 16.1 Following expiry of the initial period described in Clause 15 above, DCL or SEV giving not less than three months notice in  writing may terminate this Agreement. In addition, DCL may terminate this Agreement with effect from the 3rd, 4th or 5th  anniversary of the Commencement Date by giving not less than six months notice in writing to SEV. During the notice  period, all Clauses and provisions of this Agreement shall remain in effect. Any defects in Vehicles notified to SEV by DCL  during the notice period shall be remedied prior to the end of this Agreement. If Schedule One has expired during the  notice period then all Maintenance Charges and Additional Charges shall be charged at the rates shown in the last  effective Schedule One increased in line with the last published Retail Price Index.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by altering the termination notice period from six months to three months. This creates uncertainty regarding the required notice period for terminating the agreement after the initial period. Therefore, the inconsistency creates in-text contradictions about the correct notice period and introduces enforcement uncertainty.
